Question
========

The value of a variable X was measured in 6 subjects with the following results: 20, 27, 18, 24, 15, 22. Which statement about the mean and median of X is TRUE?

Answerlist
----------

* The mean is smaller than the median
* The mean and median are equal
* The mean is greater than the median
* Mean and median are not comparable here

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The mean is smaller than the median: Incorrect
* The mean and median are equal: Correct
* The mean is greater than the median: Incorrect
* Mean and median are not comparable here: Incorrect
